plot: Wen Tao and Jia Hui start communicating through a radiophone. From their conversations, they discover that they are both studying in the same school, but they eventually finally find out that they exist in two different worlds.
title: Oi duen liu sin
plot_es: Wen Tao and Jia Hui start communicating through a radiophone. From their conversations, they discover that they are both studying in the same school, but they eventually finally find out that they exist in two different worlds.

produce.name: One Hundred Years of Film Company
